original_title: Dziwne dziwy, czyli Jana Brzechwy Baśń o Korsarzu Palemonie
overview: The princes and princesses, according to the will of their father, King Fafala IV, try to defeat Captain Palemon, the king of the pirates. Will the bravery of the royal sons or the grace of the royal daughters defeat the famous pirate?
title: Odd Oddballs, or: Jan Brzechwa’s The Tale of Palemon the Corsair
